definition: snow/snowfall/CL:場|场[chang2]/to have the appearance of snow/to wipe away, off or out/to clean
orchid (蘭花|兰花 Cymbidium goeringii)/fragrant thoroughwort (蘭草|兰草 Eupatorium fortunei)/lily magnolia (木蘭|木兰)
surname Lan/abbr. for Lanzhou 蘭州|兰州[Lan2 zhou1], Gansu

sentences.english: Very few gas-powered passenger cars can beat the Chevy Volt off the line.
sentences.chinese: 燃油動力的乘用車很少能打敗雪佛蘭伏特。

sentences.english: Boyle threw open the door of the truck and started running after the car.
sentences.chinese: 博伊爾當即甩開卡車的門朝那輛雪佛蘭跑去。

sentences.english: In China, a Ford or Chevrolet is considered a high-end import.
sentences.chinese: 在中國，福特和雪佛蘭都被認爲是高端進口品。

sentences.english: And even last year Plymouth lost less ground to Ford than did Chevrolet.
sentences.chinese: 即使在去年普利茅斯對福特喪失的陣地也比雪佛蘭少。

sentences.english: Good news for Chevrolet enthusiasts is that the Camaro SS will remain untouched .
sentences.chinese: 好消息是，雪佛蘭愛好者的卡瑪洛黨衛軍將保持不變。

sentences.english: I like to drive my Monster Chevy Silverado 4X4 pickup truck.
sentences.chinese: 我喜歡開我的雪佛蘭四驅越野皮卡車。

sentences.english: After 20 or 30 feet, the Camaro slowed and stopped.
sentences.chinese: 一直拖了20到30英尺後，雪佛蘭車減速停了下來。

sentences.english: Buick Charleston railroad, and Chevrolet and GMC.
sentences.chinese: 阿鐵查爾斯頓別克，雪佛蘭，GMC。

sentences.english: Relatively, both Chevrolet and Plymouth lost ground.
sentences.chinese: 相對的，雪佛蘭和普利茅斯都喪失了陣地。

sentences.english: The Chevrolet Corvette Z06 is known for its unique shape.
sentences.chinese: 雪佛蘭克爾維特Z06以其獨特的形狀。

sentences.english: Take the Chevrolet Cobalt and the Mercury Grand Marquis.
sentences.chinese: 以雪佛蘭的鈷黨衛軍和水星大侯爵爲例。

sentences.english: In the case of this snarling Chevy coupe, that would be an official top speed of 205 mph.
sentences.chinese: 這款兩座雪佛蘭車的官方最高時速爲205邁。

sentences.english: The pricing of the Chevrolet entry, the Volt, has not been announced.
sentences.chinese: 雪佛蘭Volt的進價還沒有公佈。

sentences.english: The Chevy Volt has an electric motor with a battery that can run up to about 65km on a single charge.
sentences.chinese: 雪佛蘭這款電動汽車一次充電後最遠可行駛65公里。

sentences.english: A late 1950s Chevy drives along the Havana coastline on Nov. 16, 2008.
sentences.chinese: 一輛50年代末的雪佛蘭汽車駛過哈瓦那的海邊。

sentences.english: Carpluk walked in front of O'Leary's Chevy and approached the office.
sentences.chinese: 卡普拉克從奧利裏的雪佛蘭前走向辦公室。

definition: Taiwan equivalent of 奔馳|奔驰[Ben1 chi2]
Mazda Motor Corporation/also known as 馬自達|马自达
rigorous schemes and deep foresight (idiom); astute and circumspect
vehicle/(more specifically) mobility vehicle (mobility scooter, electric wheelchair, Segway etc)
look/external appearance/design/overall brand look or logo that can be patented
Iron Curtain (1945-1991) (in Taiwan, 鐵幕 was used to refer to both the Iron Curtain and the Bamboo Curtain)
